overview: The adventures of three disparate cadets at the US Naval Academy--one the son of a Navy enlisted man, the other the scion of a wealthy family, the third decent but somewhat slow-witted--and their struggles with the rigors of the academy, women, and each other.
tagline: The flag-flying story of a plebe who made the grade in the greatest naval-training school on earth!
title: Annapolis Salute
